synopsis.text: Wang Ke is a financial prodigy who is accidentally transported to the Shenzhou Star by an ancestral magic sword. Armed with his family's powerful Sun Never Sets magic, he aims to make his fortune and join the Immortal Sect. However, Wang Ke finds himself caught between the forces of good and evil vying for power. Relying on his wit and talent, Wang Ke navigates various challenges as he wins the affection of beautiful women, builds a thriving business empire, and gradually walks the righteous path of defending Taoism by defeating demons. He steadily gains allies and influence, though his ascent is complicated by sinister undercurrents. Despite production stopping abruptly after 19 episodes, Wang Ke inches closer to his destiny - becoming the immortal god and king by vanquishing evil and protecting the righteous path.
